pages.text: Sigils are magic symbols of power. They can be divided into two groups: Active and Passive Sigils.$(br2)Active Sigils need to be placed on usable blocks or brooms made from $(l:bewitchment:introduction/dragons_blood_trees)Dragon's Blood$().$(br2)Passive Sigils can be placed anywhere and will apply their effect to everything around.

$(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglocks$() can be added to Sigils to control who it affects. If a Sigil is set to regard the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglocks$() as a whitelist, the Sigil will only affect those in it. If it is set as a blacklist, the Sigil won't affect anyone the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() is from.$(br2)Use an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$() while sneaking to toggle between blacklist and whitelist.$(br2)It should be noted that all Sigils are of limited duration.
